name: Cat's Grace
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook. © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (pinch of cat fur)
text: The transmuted creature becomes more graceful, agile, and coordinated. The spell grants a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity, adding the usual benefits to AC, Reflex saves, and other uses of the Dexterity modifier.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一撮猫毛)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 受术者变得优雅、灵活，动作更加协调。该法术会使受术者的敏捷获得+4的增强加值，从而会给AC、反射豁免以及其他使用敏捷修正的方面带来通常的好处。
